media.headline: Liriano induces a double play
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Liriano forces the inning-ending double play
media.bigblurb: Francisco Liriano gets Josh Harrison to hit a ground ball to Troy Tulowitzki who starts the 6-4-3 double play to end the top of the 2nd

media.headline: Upton Jr.'s forceout scores run
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Upton Jr.'s forces a run with grounder
media.bigblurb: Melvin Upton Jr. hits a grounder to David Freese and Troy Tulowitzki scores the first run of the game

media.headline: Morales' deep RBI double
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Morales hits deep RBI double to left-center
media.bigblurb: Kendrys Morales hits an RBI double off the left-center-field wall to drive in Kevin Pillar from second base and increase the lead

media.headline: Bell's RBI single to right
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Bell hits RBI single for first Pirates run
media.bigblurb: Josh Bell hits an RBI single to right field to score Andrew McCutchen from second base, bringing the Pirates within a run

media.headline: Upton Jr. hits a two-run homer
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Upton Jr. crushes a two-run home run to left
media.bigblurb: Melvin Upton Jr. hits a two-run home run to left field to add on to the Blue Jays' lead

media.headline: Frazier's RBI single to center
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Frazier bloops an RBI single to center field
media.bigblurb: Adam Frazier hits an RBI single to center field to score another Pirates run to cut the deficit to 4-2 in the top of the 5th inning

media.headline: Tucker scores on wild pitch
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: A wild pitch on ball four scores a run
media.bigblurb: With John Jaso at the plate, ball four gets away from catcher Jared Saltalamacchia, allowing Cole Tucker to score from third base

media.headline: Wood's RBI single ties the game
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Wood's RBI single to right ties the score
media.bigblurb: Eric Wood knocks an RBI single to right field to bring home Adam Frazier from third base and tie the game at four in the top of the 5th

media.headline: Barney's RBI single
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Barney hits RBI single for the lead
media.bigblurb: Darwin Barney sends a base hit up the middle against the drawn-in infield to score Jake Elmore from third and give the Blue Jays a 5-4 lead

media.headline: Tellez powers a home run to left
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Tellez' home run doubles Blue Jays' lead
media.bigblurb: Rowdy Tellez crushes a solo home run to left-center field to double the Blue Jays' lead to 6-4 in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Kuhl strikes out Saltalamacchia
media.bigblurb: Chad Kuhl strikes out Jared Saltalamacchia looking at a breaking ball to record the first out of the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Glasnow K's Barney swinging
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Glasnow strikes out Barney swinging
media.bigblurb: Tyler Glasnow strikes out Darwin Barney swinging on a breaking ball to record the second out of the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Tim Raines throws first pitch
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Tim Raines throws out ceremonial first pitch
media.bigblurb: Tim Raines throws out the ceremonial first pitch before the second exhibition game in Montreal where Raines was a star for the Expos

media.headline: Ballboy makes a great catch
media.blurb: PIT@TOR: Ballboy in right field makes nice grab
media.bigblurb: The ballboy in right field makes a great snag on a hard liner heading towards the seats and gives the ball to a fan in the first row
